item.title: Company
item.description:
Company

Masar is a smart energy company primarily focusing on the Middle East & North Africa, which was selected as one of the top smart energy startups of 2015 by Rockstart Smart Energy Accelerator and Climate-KIC Hessen Accelerator The company was founded by award-winning serial entrepreneur Mo (Mohamed) El-Fatatry , who was awarded the "President of Finland's Internationalization Award" by President Halonen , and was among 200 business leaders recognized by President Obama at the 1st "Presidential Summit on Entrepreneurship".
